name: AddUp!
description:
This is a unqiue game based on the match3 game style.

It's fun, addictive and simple to play.

Colourfull graphics and simple gameplay, there is no timelimit but the faster you play the bigger the score.

See if you can get the highest score and become the worlds best player!

How to Play
- Click on any group that is 3 or larger
- They will disappear just leaving the one you clicked on
- This block will then increase in value
- See high a number you can get

Features
- Simple Gameplay
- World Highscores
- Colourfull Graphics
